thread.title: A great place to stay
thread.title_full: A great place to stay - Review of Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ana A
title: A great place to stay
text: I've booked the hotel based on the reviews read and it absolutely met my expectations. The location is ideal for my business trips and the room is very spacious and well furbished (everything you need for a week is there), which is sometimes difficult to find at NYC. Everything is very clean and the staff is very helpful and friendly. There are loads of restaurants close by and you can be at Madison Av in 10 mins walk.
